cheetah does what tyrael asks and he goes to the base
 warriorazure wrote:Tyrael smiles.

Tyrael: Greetings, Cheetah, and welcome to Earth. I am Tyrael, 
Tripredacus commander here. Come with me, we will head back to base 
and I will say more over there.

He transforms and flies to the nearby base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> the pod's computer replies "upgrade accepted" 
> the pod opens and the transforemers steps out and says"I am Cheetah"
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > The large bird lands besides the pod and transforms.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Looks like I have come just in time... Hopefully, it will 
> > accept this.
> > 
> > He produced a special circuitry board from a case on his right 
flank. 
> > he inserted it in the pod's computer and waited. It was a 
> > techno-organic upgrade board that would allow the bot to become 
one 
> > made of millions of electronic cells. Tripredacus scientists had 
> > worked hard to perfect the new transforming mode, but the results 
> > given were well worth it. Of course, in this case, there was no 
> > guarantee the pod would even accept the upgrade, but it would 
> > undoubtedly make the transformer a Tripredacus.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> > > 
> > > the pod scans for lifeforms and finds a cheetah
> > >  warriorazure wrote:In the Tripredacus base, the computer rings 
out 
> > an alarm. the 
> > > proximity of the falling pod was dangerously close.
> > > 
> > > Computer: Alert, Alert. Incoming pod. Shield defenses online.
> > > 
> > > Tyrael turned back to the holotable.
> > > 
> > > Tyrael: What? A pod? Landing so near? Computer, generate 
geographic 
> > > landscape with location of the pod.
> > > 
> > > The pod had touched down a mere 200 meters roughly westward from 
the 
> > > base.
> > > 
> > > Tyrael: Lower shields. Crusher, I will go out. Bring them up 
after 
> > I'm 
> > > gone. I don't plan to take too long.
> > > 
> > > He transforms to phoenix mode and flies out. Given the 
proximity, he 
> > > arrives in no time.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "lordofdarkness11001" 
<lordofdarkness11001@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > the new pod lands 200 meteres west OF the triped base(
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Tankor <lordofdarkness11001@y...> wrote:
> > > > > a new pod starts to fall from the sky.
> > > > >
